contentrichtext.text: '''Kringlan''' is the largest shopping mall<ref>http://www.visitorsguide.is/news/302/default.aspx</ref> in [[Reykjavík]] with over 170 shops, restaurants and services. Built in 1987, it contains everything from a [[library]], [[theatre]] and [[movie theater|cinema]] to a liquor store, candy stores and a pub. It has grown over the years, and is thought by many to be the biggest threat for the Reykjavík city centre stores. Kringlan is also competing with another shopping mall, [[Smáralind]] in [[Kópavogur]] for customers. ==Name== The name is derived from the Kringla marsh or [[Kringlumýri]].
